data.name: Hunted - OS100 Expansion
data.detailed_description:
This is an expansion planetary system that you can explore.

Like the main map it has all of the features such as a final boss and aliens to fight.

*You can finish the game in this planetary system*

This planetary system is quite bigger than the stations in the other system.

Features:
-Mountainous Terrain
-Rolling Hills
-That same HUNTED experience as on the main system

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 bit
  • Processor: 64 bit proccesser
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
